name: JetPack Master's
description:
Description

This Endless Runner is based on all the courses available at FEUP and the journey that is studying here.

The goal is to travel as much distance as possible across the main hall.

Random obstacles, also based on the courses (Ex: Laser - MIEEC), spawn during the game. You must avoid them unless you wish to die.

At every 200 meters, a Boss spawns and the background freezes during the fight. Shoot at the Boss to kill him and continue your travel.

Random collectibles (ECTs) can be collected in order to improve the final score.

Controls:

  • Left Mouse Click - Press to control the Jetpack;
  • Right Mouse Click - Shoot;

Authors:
